data.title: Cheap Flights to Kirovohrad, Compare and Book easily
data.meta_description: Compare and find cheap Kirovohrad flight deals, book and buy Kirovohrad flight tickets online securely and easily. Instantly compare all Kirovohrad-bound flights to book the best deal quickly and securely in a few simple steps.
data.text:
Kropyvnytskyi Airport is located only 5 kilometers of the city center. Therefore, you need to provide your transportation by using a private vehicle. In addition to the taxis offering service within the body of Kropyvnytskyi Airport, you can benefit from car rental or transfer services for travelling to Kropyvnytskyi city center. Travelling to Kropyvnytskyi city center from Kropyvnytskyi Airport lasts about 10 minutes.

Taxi

Travelling to Kropyvnytskyi city center from Kropyvnytskyi Airport by using one of the airport taxis offering fast and comfortable transportation service at every hour of the day costs about 50-65 Ukrainian Hryvnia. The taxis wait for their passengers in front of Kropyvnytskyi Airport arrival terminal. You can reach the city center in about 5-6 minutes by taxi.

Car Rental

You can get information about the car rental companies offering service at Kropyvnytskyi Airport before your travel. You can make a reservation over the internet or telephone after getting information about the car rental prices. You can reach Kropyvnytskyi city center from Kropyvnytskyi Airport in about 5-6 minutes with the car you will rent at Kropyvnytskyi Airport.
